options.content:
**Dashboard Purpose**: Analyze team workload distribution, performance metrics, and identify bottlenecks.

**Key Findings**:
- **PendingAssignment Backlog**: 3,131 tickets (28.6%) - Critical bottleneck requiring attention
- **Resolution Time Improvement**: 75% faster (5.3 days → 1.09 days, July→October)
- **Task Distribution**: 41.4% Communications, 25% Administration, 31.9% Technical, 1.8% Expert
- **Top Performer**: Robert Quito (1,002 tickets, 88.9% close rate)

**Use Cases**: Workload balancing, performance evaluation, bottleneck identification, capacity planning

panels.title: Ticket Volume by Assignee (Top 15)
panels.description: Total tickets handled by each team member

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  "TKT-Assigned To User" as "Assignee",
  COUNT(*) as "Tickets"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Team" IN ('${team:raw}') AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
AND "TKT-Assigned To User" IS NOT NULL 
AND "TKT-Assigned To User" <> 'PendingAssignment'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC
LIMIT 15;

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%call%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%pbx%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%teams%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%meeting%' THEN 'Communication/Collaboration'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%email%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%mailbox%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%access%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%password%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%license%' THEN 'Administrative/Operational'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%patch%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%install%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%troubleshoot%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%fix%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%issue%' THEN 'Technical (Implementation + Troubleshooting)'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%azure%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%architect%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%design%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%security%' THEN 'Specialized/Expert'
    ELSE 'Other'
  END as "Task Level",
  COUNT(*) as "Count"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Team" IN ('${team:raw}') AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

panels.title: Average Resolution Time by Week
panels.description: Weekly average time from ticket creation to resolution

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC('week', "TKT-Created Time") as time,
  AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM ("TKT-Actual Resolution Date" - "TKT-Created Time")) / 86400.0) as "Avg Days to Resolve"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Team" IN ('${team:raw}') AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
AND "TKT-Actual Resolution Date" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: PendingAssignment Backlog
panels.description: Tickets awaiting assignment - workload distribution bottleneck

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as "Unassigned Tickets",
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM servicedesk.tickets WHERE "TKT-Team" IN ('${team:raw}') AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'), 2) as "% of Total"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Team" IN ('${team:raw}') AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
AND "TKT-Assigned To User" = 'PendingAssignment';

SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as "Comms Tickets",
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM servicedesk.tickets WHERE "TKT-Team" IN ('${team:raw}') AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'), 2) as "% of Total"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Team" IN ('${team:raw}') AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
AND ("TKT-Title" ILIKE '%call%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%pbx%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%teams%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%3cx%');

panels.title: Ticket Volume Heatmap (Assignee x Category)
panels.description: Shows workload distribution across team and ticket categories

targets.rawSql:
WITH top_assignees AS (
  SELECT "TKT-Assigned To User"
  FROM servicedesk.tickets
  WHERE "TKT-Team" IN ('${team:raw}') AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
  AND "TKT-Assigned To User" IS NOT NULL AND "TKT-Assigned To User" <> 'PendingAssignment'
  GROUP BY 1
  ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
  LIMIT 10
)
SELECT 
  t."TKT-Assigned To User" as "Assignee",
  t."TKT-Category" as "Category",
  COUNT(*) as "Count"
FROM servicedesk.tickets t
INNER JOIN top_assignees ta ON t."TKT-Assigned To User" = ta."TKT-Assigned To User"
WHERE "TKT-Team" IN ('${team:raw}') AND t."TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND t."TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
AND t."TKT-Category" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1, 3 DESC;

panels.title: Top Assignees with Performance Metrics
panels.description: Detailed assignee statistics with resolution times and workload

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  "TKT-Assigned To User" as "Assignee",
  COUNT(*) as "Total Tickets",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN "TKT-Status" = 'Closed' THEN 1 END) as "Closed",
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN "TKT-Status" = 'Closed' THEN 1 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 1) as "Close Rate %",
  ROUND(AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM ("TKT-Actual Resolution Date" - "TKT-Created Time")) / 3600.0), 2) as "Avg Hours to Resolve",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN "TKT-Category" = 'Alert' THEN 1 END) as "Alerts",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN "TKT-Category" = 'Support Tickets' THEN 1 END) as "Support",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN "TKT-Severity" = 'Priority 1' THEN 1 END) as "P1 Tickets"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Team" IN ('${team:raw}') AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
AND "TKT-Assigned To User" IS NOT NULL 
AND "TKT-Assigned To User" <> 'PendingAssignment'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC
LIMIT 15;

panels.title: Team Workload Trends (Top 5 Assignees)
panels.description: Weekly ticket assignment trends for busiest team members

targets.rawSql:
WITH top_5 AS (
  SELECT "TKT-Assigned To User"
  FROM servicedesk.tickets
  WHERE "TKT-Team" IN ('${team:raw}') AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
  AND "TKT-Assigned To User" IS NOT NULL AND "TKT-Assigned To User" <> 'PendingAssignment'
  GROUP BY 1
  ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
  LIMIT 5
)
SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC('week', t."TKT-Created Time") as time,
  t."TKT-Assigned To User" as metric,
  COUNT(*) as value
FROM servicedesk.tickets t
INNER JOIN top_5 ON t."TKT-Assigned To User" = top_5."TKT-Assigned To User"
WHERE "TKT-Team" IN ('${team:raw}') AND t."TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND t."TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1, 2;
